title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no USB ports
message: Hi guys, got this 2936 board with no USB. After initial troubleshooting i found J4600 had 5V on L4605 and J4610 not on L4615. On both USB mouse was not working though. Found a short to ground on PP5V_S3_RTUSB_B_ILIM so replaced U4600 (5V was going in on 2/3 and out on 8 but 9 nothing), C4617 C4615 and L4615. After this short gone and voltage back. Now J4610 is all fine and J4600 show a light on the mouse but not working yet. Going to check datalines next but i need to figure how this works so any tips for speeding up my learning curve are welcome.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no USB ports
message: Bad L4600, check continuity between pin 1-2 and 3-4

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no USB ports
message: D4600 was loose on the board, fixed now:) thanks
